title: Diya Aur Baati Hum sequel coming soon; 5 things to know about the new installment : Soaps, News - India Today
text:
Soaps Diya Aur Baati Hum sequel coming soon; 5 things to know about the new installment Fans, your wish has been granted. Diya Aur Baati Hum sequel is coming soon on your TV screens. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Parmita Uniyal A + A - A still from Diya Aur Baati Hum. 
The shooting for the much-awaited second season of Diya Aur Baati Hum has just kicked off. The fans of the popular show starring Deepika Singh and Anas Rashid in lead roles have been demanding a fresh season, and their wish has finally been granted. The new show will be centred around the new generation, but the spirit of Diya Aur Baati Hum will remain intact. 
Also read: The Season Finale of Diya Aur Baati Hum might just have you breaking down in tears 
Here are 5 things that you must know about Diya Aur Baati Hum 2. One of the prominent characters of the show Santosh Rathi aka Bhabhi has revealed the title of the upcoming season. It will be called Tu Sooraj Main Saanjh Piyaji. The new title of the show, which ran for over five years between 2011 to 2016, has been taken from the original title track of Diya Aur Baati Hum. Diya Aur Baati Hum 2 will start from where the first part ended; the new Star Plus entertainer will take a leap of 20 years and bring back Rathi family with old and new faces. Neely Vaghela will also get a style makeover. While she donned chaniya choli in Diya Aur Baati Hum, in the sequel, she will be seen more in saris and also specs. However, the character will remain the same. The original lead cast of Diya Aur Baati Hum--Deepika Singh and Anas Rashid will not be a part of the sequel, the new show will be centred around their children Ved and Kanak. A portion of the show will also be shot in Kerala. The show will continue to be based on the theme of women empowerment much like its predecessor. 
(With inputs from IANS)
